headline: F5 Application Delivery and Security Platform Introduces Data Leakage Detection and Prevention for Securing AI Workloads
summary: SEATTLE, July 16, 2025--F5 (NASDAQ: FFIV), the global leader in delivering and securing every app and API, today announced new AI-driven capabilities for the F5 Application Delivery and Security Platform (ADSP). These updates provide organizations with advanced tools to secure sensitive data and manage AI-powered applications, including expanded capabilities in F5 AI Gateway to prevent data leaks and deliver cutting-edge AI data protection.
